pages.text: Birkenia is a jawless fish from the Silurian period. It had a armored body with rod shaped scales along its body. It also had several spines on the top of its body with one spine that had a distinct anvil shape.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
